issue.title: [C++] Add a range_expression interface to Iterator<>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6847](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6847). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Iterator provides the Visit() method for visiting each element, but idiomatic C++ uses a range for loop

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6847?focusedCommentId=16953012) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5621
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5621>
